properties.name: management.tracing.baggage.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Micrometer Tracing baggage propagation.

properties.name: management.tracing.default-logging-pattern-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable automated log format that contains tracing information.

properties.name: management.tracing.log-service-name
properties.description: Service name to be used in log. Defaults to spring.application.name .
